Package com.cyberfront.crdt.sample.simulation

Class Message<T extends AbstractDataType>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cyberfront.crdt.sample.simulation.Message<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The generic type of the object the operations is intended to operate upon
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Message<? extends AbstractDataType>>
    public final class Message<T extends AbstractDataType>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Message<? extends AbstractDataType>>
    The Message class encapsulates a delivery mechanism for moving an operation generated at one node on a particular CRDT object to another Node so that it may be delivered to the corresponding CRDT at the destination node. The generic type of the Message corresponds to the type of object for the operation which the Message object is delivering.

        Instantiates a new message.
        Parameters:
        srcNodeId - Name of the source node for the message
        dstNodeId - Name of the message destination node
        mgr - Operation manager containing the operation details to pass from the source to destination node
        timestamp - The scheduled delivery time stamp

      • Message

        public Message​(java.util.UUID srcNodeId,

               SimOperationManager<T> mgr)

        Parameters:
        srcNodeId - The node identifier value of the node from which the Message originated
        dstNodeId - The node identifier value of the node to which the Message is intended to be delivered
        mgr - The operation manager which is to be delivered to the destination node

      • filterMessages

        public static java.util.Collection<Message<? extends AbstractDataType>> filterMessages​(java.util.Collection<Message<? extends AbstractDataType>> collection,
                                                                                       Operation.OperationType opType,
                                                                                       boolean criteriaType)
        Filter the given messages with the criteria presented and return a list containing the filtered collection of Message instances
        Parameters:
        collection - Input collection of messages to filter
        opType - The operation type used as the basis of the filter
        criteriaType - When true return all Messages with an operation of the given type; when false return all Message instances with an operation different than the given type
        Returns:
        The collection of Message instance retrieved as part of the filter operation

      • filterMessages

        public static java.util.Collection<Message<? extends AbstractDataType>> filterMessages​(java.util.Collection<Message<? extends AbstractDataType>> collection,
                                                                                       OperationManager.StatusType stType,
                                                                                       boolean criteriaStatus)
        Filter the given messages with the criteria presented and return a list containing the filtered collection of Message instances
        Parameters:
        collection - Input collection of messages to filter
        stType - The status type used as the basis of the filter
        criteriaStatus - When true return all Messages with an operation of the given status; when false return all Message instances with an operation different than the given status
        Returns:
        The collection of Message instance retrieved as part of the filter operation

      • filterMessages

        public static java.util.Collection<Message<? extends AbstractDataType>> filterMessages​(java.util.Collection<Message<? extends AbstractDataType>> collection,
                                                                                       Operation.OperationType opType,
                                                                                       boolean criteriaType,
                                                                                       OperationManager.StatusType stType,
                                                                                       boolean criteriaStatus)
        Filter the given messages with the criteria presented and return a list containing the filtered collection of Message instances
        Parameters:
        collection - Input collection of messages to filter
        opType - The operation type used as the basis of the filter
        criteriaType - When true return all Messages with an operation of the given type; when false return all Message instances with an operation different than the given type
        stType - The status type used as the basis of the filter
        criteriaStatus - When true return all Messages with an operation of the given status; when false return all Message instances with an operation different than the given status
        Returns:
        The collection of Message instance retrieved as part of the filter operation

      • checkConsistency

        public static void checkConsistency​(Message<? extends AbstractDataType> msg)

        Parameters:
